alert.note: Alert for Gwinnett (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 09 at 6:50PM EST until January 10 at 12:19AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Observed flooding changed to Minor severity and increased in duration for the following rivers in Georgia... Sweetwater Creek at Club Drive near Lilburn affecting Gwinnett County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Sweetwater Creek at Club Drive near Lilburn. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding will occur in portions of the Northwood Country Club Golf Course upstream from the gage on Club Drive...and in the woodland areas downstream from the gage and for the next four miles until the creek merges with the Yellow River. An old concrete golf cart bridge around 300 feet downstream from the gage will begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 11.4 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 6:30 PM EST Tuesday was 12.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 6.6 feet this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.5 feet on 04/05/2022. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1230 AM EST.
